Title: Relates to the testing of newborns for spinal muscular atrophy and public education thereon
Summary: Requires the testing of newborns for spinal muscular atrophy; requires the department of health to educate the public and distribute informational materials on spinal muscular atrophy.
LawCode: Amd ยง2500-a, add ยง2500-n, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the testing of newborns for spinal muscular atrophy and public education thereon
